name: Shadows from the Past
description:
Fallen Kingdoms

Allard Hardouin is one of the survivors from the massacre done by 5 cities that feared Aeherian, the city where Allarad used to live. Allard decided to take a different path from his enemies and find himself again trying to search where this selfishness comes from, but his enemies will try to hunt him, letting him decide to defend himself by eliminating them.

In this fighting advnture in 2.5D you will fight agains different enemies, trying to pass through traps, places and people that will try to stop you.

Try to beat them before they kill you, use everything you've got and fight till the last breath.

Controls:

A/D - Left or Right

W/D - Up or Down

J/K - Attack

Power Ups:

-Fire Sword:

Increase Damage

-Lightning Sword:

Increase Movement Speed

-Shield Sword:

Increase Defense
